title: Where can I get the CBSE improvement marksheet? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: You’ll get your improvement marksheet in the regional office of CBSE according to your exam centre location. Example: your exam centre was KV School Punjabi Bagh, which comes under Mangolpuri CBSE regional office. So you'll have to reach to your regional CBSE office to collect the improvement marksheet. And also get confirmation from exam centre in cases CBSE refers the marksheet sometimes to them.
It will be delivered to your residence address soon.I got my marksheet on 22/06/17. You will also get soon by speed post.
